page.title: 20OPINIONS IN THE CAMELS'AREA.
page.content: A survey was conducted into the attitudes of local people towards R.N.A.S. Yeovilton on the edge of our area. In a sample of 140 people only 33 people were bothered by the noise of aircraft,while 45 people felt that house prices were higher because of the demand from personnel. 41 people used facilities at the base ,mainly sporting. 115 didnt think the base contributed to traffic problems as it was diversified by the time it came into our area. 122 agreed that the base provides jobs for the people living in our area,but thought it was not a major factor in employment. The Sparkford by-pass is due to be built in the 1980's, 89 out of the 140 residents questioned believe that it will be of benifit to local residents.
